data.system_settings: iOS 10.2, iPhone 5c, Discord latest beta from Testflight
data.expected_result: Nothing; the member drawer should be on its correct side and the chat drawer should be in its correct side.
data.short_description: Member and Chat selectors are switched
data.steps_to_repro: - Spam the channel selector button (the three bars) while spamming the member selector (the little person icon)
